title: Should Miami Be Worried?
description:
Pablo Torre, Israel Gutierrez and For The Win's Charles McDonald debate if we should be worried about the #1 seed Heat be after Jimmy Butler’s dustup with Spo & Udonis Haslem last night and if they view the Nets as the team to beat in the East now that Kyrie can be a full-time player.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Should We Be Worried About The Heat After Arguments On The Bench?
